aboutData.imgAltText: Rest with overnight stay near Moscow
aboutData.text: Comfortable, secluded cottages equipped with everything you need
Spacious locations of 50 sq.m. with a cozy veranda and a relaxation area
Russian sauna with a panoramic view where you can relax after long walks

eventsData.title: SPORTS GAMES
eventsData.text: A healthy body leads to a healthy spirit. In a healthy atmosphere, there's healthy sports. Fresh air, Russian sauna, barbecue – an ideal choice for lovers of active recreation.

eventsData.title: BARBECUE
eventsData.text: Barbecue like in the movies? That's exactly how it looks here. Everything you need is in one place, in perfect proportions, and seasoned with excellent service.

eventsData.title: PICNIC
eventsData.text: Food in nature always tastes better, and with friends and family – even more delicious. Have your dream picnic with us; unforgettable memories are guaranteed.

eventsData.title: SHISH KEBABS
eventsData.text: Having fun and eating deliciously in the fresh air is the perfect combination. Invite your family, friends, or acquaintances and come to us for shish kebabs.

eventsData.title: BIRTHDAY
eventsData.text: The most important celebration is worth remembering for a long time. Therefore, it should be celebrated correctly. We offer everything you need for this, especially for you!

eventsData.imgAltText: Sauna on the shore of Iksha Reservoir
eventsData.title: SAUNA AND SPA
eventsData.text: Unity with nature, a combination of Russian traditions and a modern approach to self-care. We know how to combine the uncombinable and create unforgettable experiences.

eventsData.title: KARAOKE PARTY
eventsData.text: In a pleasant and soulful atmosphere, everyone sings and asks for music? In that case, everyone dances too! And sings too. Karaoke is at your service.

eventsData.title: BACHELORETTE PARTY
eventsData.text: The female team wants to gossip and share secrets without unnecessary boys? Or vice versa, with them? Come and relax; we won't tell anyone.

eventsData.title: BACHELOR PARTY
eventsData.text: The male company is looking for a place for a good masculine rest? Absolutely right, that's why we invite you.

eventsData.title: WEDDING
eventsData.text: A wedding is one of the most important events in a person's life, a special day when everything should be perfect. Entrust the organization to us; we won't disappoint you.

eventsData.title: POST-WEDDING PARTY
eventsData.text: The feeling of the beginning of your family history should also be perfect, and we know about it like no one else. We will help organize the continuation of your wedding ceremony.

eventsData.imgAltText: Corporate Events in the Moscow Region
eventsData.title: CORPORATE & TEAM BUILDING
eventsData.text: Get out of the office and into the countryside? Great idea, but how to organize it all? The answer is simple – come to us. We have everything ready, beautiful nature, and complete comfort are waiting!
